author: Anthony Spadafora
title: Giving back during a crisis: what VPN companies are doing to help
description: VPN providers are offering their services for free as well as taking other actions to help out during the global pandemic.
content: The ongoing coronavirus outbreak has brought daily life to a standstill in many parts of the world and while tech giants such as Microsoft, Google and Apple are doing their share to help, so too are VPN companies and a number of other companies (check out our… [+3341 chars]
